BioLib  3.2.0
A GUI-less version of Bio .NET library for editing & annotating various microscopy image formats.

◆ AutoThreshold() [2/2]

static void BioLib.BioImage.AutoThreshold ( BioImage b,
bool updateImageStats )
static

It takes a BioImage object, and calculates the mean histogram for each channel, and for the entire image.

The BioImage object is a class that contains a list of buffers, each of which contains a byte array of pixel data.

The function also calculates the mean histogram for each buffer, and stores it in the buffer's stats property.

The function also calculates the mean histogram for each channel, and stores it in the channel's stats property.

The function also calculates the mean histogram for the entire image, and stores it in the image's statistics property.

The mean histogram is calculated by adding up the histograms of each buffer, and then dividing by the number of buffers.

The histogram is calculated by looping through the byte array of pixel data, and incrementing the value of the histogram at the index of the pixel value.

The histogram

Parameters
BioImageThis is the image object that contains the image data.
updateImageStatsif true, the image stats will be updated.

Definition at line 9251 of file Bio.cs.

9252 {
9253 bstats = b;
9254 Statistics statistics = null;
9255 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
9256 statistics = new Statistics(true);
9257 else
9258 statistics = new Statistics(false);
9259 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
9260 {
9261 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
9262 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
9263 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9264 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
9265 else
9266 {
9267 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
9268 {
9269 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
9270 }
9271 }
9272 }
9273 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
9274 {
9275 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
9276 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
9277 {
9278 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
9279 {
9280 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
9281 }
9282 else
9283 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
9284 }
9285 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
9286 {
9287 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
9288 {
9289 int ind;
9290 if(b.Channels.Count > b.SizeC)
9291 {
9292 ind = b.GetFrameIndex(z, 0, t);
9293 }
9294 else
9295 ind = b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, t);
9296 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9297 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
9298 else
9299 {
9300 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
9301 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
9302 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
9303 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
9304 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
9305 }
9306 }
9307 }
9308 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
9309 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
9310 else
9311 {
9312 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
9313 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
9314 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
9315 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
9316 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
9317 }
9318 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
9319 }
9320 statistics.MeanHistogram();
9321 b.statistics = statistics;
9322 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), true, b, updateImageStats);
9323 }

◆ CalculateFocusQuality()

static long BioLib.BioImage.CalculateFocusQuality ( Bitmap b)
static

The function calculates the focus quality of a given bitmap image.

Parameters
BitmapA class representing a bitmap image, which contains information about the image's size, pixel data, and color channels.
Returns
The method is returning a long value which represents the calculated focus quality of the input Bitmap image.

Definition at line 9376 of file Bio.cs.

9377 {
9378 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
9379 {
9380 long sum = 0;
9381 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
9382 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
9383 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
9384 {
9385 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
9386 sum += pixel.R;
9387 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
9388 }
9389 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
9390 }
9391 else
9392 {
9393 long sum = 0;
9394 long sumOfSquares = 0;
9395 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
9396 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
9397 {
9398 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
9399 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
9400 sum += p;
9401 sumOfSquares += p * p;
9402 }
9403 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),true,b);
9404 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
9405 }
9406 }

◆ ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff()

static Bitmap BioLib.BioImage.ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff ( BioImage b,
int x,
int y,
int width,
int height,
int level )
static

The function ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff takes a BioImage object, coordinates, width, height, and resolution as input, and returns a Bitmap object representing the extracted region from the tiled TIFF image.

Parameters
BioImageThe BioImage object represents an image file that contains multiple pages or resolutions. It contains information about the image file, such as the file path, the number of pages, and the format of each page.
xThe x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the region to extract from the tiled TIFF image.
yThe parameter "y" represents the starting y-coordinate of the region to be extracted from the tiled TIFF image.
widthThe width parameter represents the width of the region to be extracted from the tiled TIFF image.
heightThe height parameter represents the height of the region to be extracted from the tiled TIFF image.
resThe parameter "res" represents the resolution level of the tiled TIFF image. It is used to specify the level of detail or zoom level at which the image is being extracted.
Returns
The method is returning a Bitmap object.

Definition at line 7040 of file Bio.cs.

7041 {
7042 try
7043 {
7044 // Validate inputs
7045 if (b == null) throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(b));
7046 if (b.vipPages == null || b.vipPages.Count <= level) throw new ArgumentException("Invalid image level.");
7047
7048 // Extract the region from the specified level
7049 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[level].ExtractArea(x, y, width, height);
7050
7051 // Convert the NetVips.Image to Bitmap
7052 Bitmap bitmap = ConvertVipsImageToBitmap(subImage, b.bitsPerPixel);
7053
7054 // Clean up
7055 subImage.Dispose();
7056
7057 return bitmap;
7058 }
7059 catch (Exception ex)
7060 {
7061 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}\n{ex.StackTrace}");
7062 return null;
7063 }
7064 }

◆ FilesToStack()

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.FilesToStack ( string[] files,
int sizeZ,
int sizeC,
int sizeT )
static

It takes a list of files, and creates a new BioImage object with the first file in the list. Then it loops through the rest of the files, adding the buffers from each file to the new BioImage object. Finally, it updates the coordinates of the new BioImage object, and adds it to the Images list.

Parameters
filesan array of file paths
sizeZnumber of slices in the stack
sizeCnumber of channels
sizeTnumber of time points
Returns
A BioImage object.

6936 {

6938 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
6939 }
6940 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
6941 Images.AddImage(b);
6942 return b;
6943 }

◆ FindFocus()

static int BioLib.BioImage.FindFocus ( BioImage im,
int Channel,
int Time )
static

The function finds the focus of a given BioImage at a specific channel and time by calculating the focus quality of each Z-plane and returning the coordinate with the highest focus quality.

Parameters
BioImageA BioImage object that contains the image data.
ChannelThe channel of the BioImage to analyze. A BioImage can have multiple channels, each representing a different fluorescent label or imaging modality.
TimeThe time point at which the focus is being calculated.
Returns
an integer value which represents the coordinate of the image with the highest focus quality in a given channel and time.

Definition at line 9349 of file Bio.cs.

9350 {
9351 long mf = 0;
9352 int fr = 0;
9353 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
9354 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
9355 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
9356 {
9357 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.GetFrameIndex(i, Channel, Time)]);
9358 dt.Add(f);
9359 if (f > mf)
9360 {
9361 mf = f;
9362 fr = im.GetFrameIndex(i, Channel, Time);
9363 }
9364 }
9365
9366 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),false, im, Channel, Time);
9367 return fr;
9368 }

6709 {
6710 BioImage bm = new BioImage(file);
6711 var (shape, dataType, data) = NumPy.ReadNpyFile(file);
6712
6713 // Handle different shapes and cast the data into appropriate multi-dimensional arrays
6714 if (shape.Length == 5)
6715 {
6716 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6717 {
6718 float[,,,,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<float, float[,,,,]>(data, shape);
6719 for (int z = 0; z < shape[2]; z++)
6720 {
6721 for (int c = 0; c < shape[1]; c++)
6722 {
6723 for (int t = 0; t < shape[0]; t++)
6724 {
6725 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[3], shape[4], PixelFormat.Float);
6726 for (int y = 0; y < shape[4]; y++)
6727 {
6728 for (int x = 0; x < shape[3]; x++)
6729 {
6730 b.SetValue(x,y,fs[t, c, z, x, y]);
6731 }
6732 }
6733 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6734 }
6735 }
6736 }
6737 }
6738 else if(dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6739 {
6740 uint[,,,,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<uint, uint[,,,,]>(data, shape);
6741 for (int z = 0; z < shape[2]; z++)

6743 for (int c = 0; c < shape[1]; c++)
6744 {
6745 for (int t = 0; t < shape[0]; t++)
6746 {

6748 for (int y = 0; y < shape[4]; y++)
6749 {
6750 for (int x = 0; x < shape[3]; x++)
6751 {
6752 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[t, c, z, x, y]);
6753 }
6754 }
6755 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6756 }
6757 }
6758 }
6759 }
6760 bm.sizeZ = shape[2];
6761 bm.sizeC = shape[1];
6762 bm.sizeT = shape[0];

6765 {
6766 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6767 {
6768 float[,,,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<float, float[,,,]>(data, shape);
6769 for (int z = 0; z < shape[1]; z++)
6770 {
6771 for (int c = 0; c < shape[0]; c++)
6772 {
6773 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[2], shape[3], PixelFormat.Float);
6774 for (int y = 0; y < shape[3]; y++)
6775 {
6776 for (int x = 0; x < shape[2]; x++)
6777 {
6778 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[c, z, x, y]);
6779 }
6780 }
6781 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6782 }
6783 }
6784 }
6785 else if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6786 {

6788 for (int z = 0; z < shape[1]; z++)

6790 for (int c = 0; c < shape[0]; c++)
6791 {

6800 bm.Buffers.Add(b);

6803 }

6805 bm.sizeC = shape[0];
6806 }
6807 else if (shape.Length == 3)
6808 {
6809 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6810 {
6811 float[,,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<float, float[,,]>(data, shape);
6812 for (int z = 0; z < shape[0]; z++)
6813 {
6814 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[1], shape[2], PixelFormat.Float);
6815 for (int y = 0; y < shape[1]; y++)
6816 {
6817 for (int x = 0; x < shape[2]; x++)
6818 {
6819 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[z, x, y]);
6820 }
6821 }
6822 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6823 }
6824 }
6825 else if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6826 {
6827 uint[,,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<uint, uint[,,]>(data, shape);
6828 for (int z = 0; z < shape[0]; z++)
6829 {
6830 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[1], shape[2], PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);
6831 for (int y = 0; y < shape[1]; y++)
6832 {
6833 for (int x = 0; x < shape[2]; x++)
6834 {
6835 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[z, x, y]);
6836 }
6837 }
6838 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6839 }
6840 }
6841 bm.sizeZ = shape[0];
6842 bm.sizeC = 1;
6843 }
6844 else if (shape.Length == 2)
6845 {
6846 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6847 {
6848 float[,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<float, float[,]>(data, shape);
6849 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[0], shape[1], PixelFormat.Float);
6850 for (int y = 0; y < shape[1]; y++)
6851 {
6852 for (int x = 0; x < shape[0]; x++)
6853 {
6854 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[x, y]);
6855 }
6856 }
6857 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6858 }
6859 else if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6860 {
6861 uint[,] fs = NumPy.ConvertToMultidimensional<uint, uint[,]>(data, shape);
6862 Bitmap b = new Bitmap(shape[0], shape[1], PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed);
6863 for (int y = 0; y < shape[1]; y++)
6864 {
6865 for (int x = 0; x < shape[0]; x++)
6866 {
6867 b.SetValue(x, y, fs[x, y]);
6868 }
6869 }
6870 bm.Buffers.Add(b);
6871 }
6872 bm.sizeC = 1;
6873 bm.sizeZ = 1;
6874 }
6875 else
6876 {
6877 throw new InvalidOperationException("Unsupported array shape.");
6878 }
6879
6880 for (int i = 0; i < bm.SizeC; i++)
6881 {
6882 if (bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.UInt || bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Int)
6883 bm.Channels.Add(new Channel(i, 32, 1));
6884 else
6885 if (bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
6886 bm.Channels.Add(new Channel(i, 8, 1));
6887 }
6888 bm.sizeT = 1;
6889 bm.Coords = new int[bm.SizeZ, bm.SizeC, bm.SizeT];
6890 bm.UpdateCoords();
6891 bm.bitsPerPixel = 8;
6892 if(dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Float32)
6893 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.Float, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6894 else
6895 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt32)
6896 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.UInt, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6897 else
6898 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.Int32)
6899 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.Int, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6900 else
6901 if (dataType == NumPy.NpyDataType.UInt8)
6902 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(bm.SizeX, bm.SizeY, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 0, 0, 0));
6903 foreach (var item in bm.Buffers)
6904 {
6905 item.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(item);
6906 }
6907 bm.Type = ImageType.stack;
6908 bm.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(bm.StageSizeX, bm.StageSizeY, bm.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(bm.PhysicalSizeX * bm.SizeX, bm.PhysicalSizeY * bm.SizeY, bm.PhysicalSizeZ * bm.SizeZ));
6909 AutoThreshold(bm, false);
6910 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6911 bm.StackThreshold(true);
6912 else
6913 bm.StackThreshold(false);
6914 bm.StackOrder = Order.ZCT;
6915 bm.ID = Path.GetFileName(file);
6916 bm.Filename = bm.ID;
6917 bm.file = file;
6918 Images.AddImage(bm);
6919 return bm;
6920 }

◆ GetBands()

static int BioLib.BioImage.GetBands ( PixelFormat format)
static

The function "GetBands" returns the number of color bands for a given pixel format in the AForge library.

Parameters
PixelFormatThe PixelFormat parameter is an enumeration that represents the format of a pixel in an image. It specifies the number of bits per pixel and the color space used by the pixel. The PixelFormat enumeration is defined in the AForge.Imaging namespace.
Returns
The method is returning the number of color bands for a given pixel format.

6520 {
6521 switch (format)
6522 {
6523 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
6524 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
6525 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
6526 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
6527 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
6528 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
6529 return 4;
6530 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
6531 return 3;
6532 default:
6533 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");

◆ GetBitmapRGB()

static

It takes a byte array of RGB or RGBA data and converts it to a Bitmap.

Parameters
wwidth of the image
hheight of the image
PixelFormatThe pixel format of the image.
btsthe byte array of the image
Returns

Definition at line 5038 of file Bio.cs.

5039 {
5040 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
5041 {
5042 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5043 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5044 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5045 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5046 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5047 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5048 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5049 {
5050 //getting the pixels of current row
5051 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5052 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
5053 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5054 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5055 {
5056 int indexRGB = x * 4;
5057 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5058 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
5059 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
5060 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
5061 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
5062 }
5063 }
5064 //unlocking bits and disposing image
5065 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5066 return bmp;
5067 }
5068 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
5069 {
5070 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5071 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5072 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5073 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5074 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5075 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5076 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5077 {
5078 //getting the pixels of current row
5079 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5080 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
5081 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5082 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5083 {
5084 int indexRGB = x * 3;
5085 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5086 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
5087 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
5088 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
5089 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
5090 }
5091 }
5092 //unlocking bits and disposing image
5093 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5094 return bmp;
5095 }
5096 else
5097 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
5098 {
5099 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5100 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5101 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5102 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5103 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5104 unsafe
5105 {
5106 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5107 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5108 {
5109 //getting the pixels of current row
5110 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5111 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
5112 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5113 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5114 {
5115 int indexRGB = x * 6;
5116 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5117 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
5118 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
5119 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
5120 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
5121 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
5122 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
5123 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
5124 }
5125 }
5126 }
5127 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5128 return bmp;
5129 }
5130 else
5131 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
5132 {
5133 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5134 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5135 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5136 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5137 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5138 unsafe
5139 {
5140 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5141 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5142 {
5143 //getting the pixels of current row
5144 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5145 int rowRGB = y * w;
5146 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5147 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5148 {
5149 int indexRGB = x;
5150 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5151 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
5152 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
5153 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
5154 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
5155 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
5156 }
5157 }
5158 }
5159 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5160 return bmp;
5161 }
5162 else
5163 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
5164 {
5165 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
5166 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
5167 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
5168 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
5169 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
5170 unsafe
5171 {
5172 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
5173 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
5174 {
5175 //getting the pixels of current row
5176 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
5177 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
5178 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
5179 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
5180 {
5181 int indexRGB = x * 2;
5182 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
5183 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
5184 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
5185 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
5186 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
5187 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
5188 }
5189 }
5190 }
5191 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
5192 return bmp;
5193 }
5194
5195 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
5196 }

8080 {
8081 if (bt == 8)
8082 return 255;
8083 if (bt == 9)
8084 return 512;
8085 else if (bt == 10)
8086 return 1023;
8087 else if (bt == 11)
8088 return 2047;

8090 return 4095;
8091 else if (bt == 13)
8092 return 8191;
8093 else if (bt == 14)
8094 return 16383;
8095 else if (bt == 15)
8096 return 32767;
8097 else
8098 return 65535;
8099 }

◆ GetBitsPerPixel()

static int BioLib.BioImage.GetBitsPerPixel ( int bt)
static

‍If the number is less than or equal to 255, then it's 8 bits. If it's less than or equal to 512, then it's 9 bits. If it's less than or equal to 1023, then it's 10 bits. If it's less than or equal to 2047, then it's 11 bits. If it's less than or equal to 4095, then it's 12 bits. If it's less than or equal to 8191, then it's 13 bits. If it's less than or equal to 16383, then it's 14 bits. If it's less than or equal to 32767, then it's 15 bits. If it's less than or equal to 65535, then it's 16 bits

Parameters
btThe number of bits per pixel.
Returns
The number of bits per pixel.

8056 return 8;
8057 if (bt <= 512)
8058 return 9;
8059 else if (bt <= 1023)
8060 return 10;
8061 else if (bt <= 2047)
8062 return 11;
8063 else if (bt <= 4095)
8064 return 12;
8065 else if (bt <= 8191)
8066 return 13;
8067 else if (bt <= 16383)
8068 return 14;
8069 else if (bt <= 32767)
8070 return 15;
8071 else
8072 return 16;

◆ GetIndex()

int BioLib.BioImage.GetIndex ( int ix,
int iy )

‍GetIndex(x,y) = (y * stridex + x) * 2

The stridex is the width of the image in bytes.

The stridey is the height of the image in bytes.

Parameters
ixx coordinate of the pixel
iyThe y coordinate of the pixel
Returns
The index of the pixel in the array.

Definition at line 4706 of file Bio.cs.

4707 {
4708 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
4709 return 0;
4710 int stridex = SizeX;
4711 int x = ix;
4712 int y = iy;
4713 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
4714 {
4715 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
4716 }
4717 else
4718 {
4719 return (y * stridex + x);
4720 }
4721 }

◆ GetPixelFormat() [1/2]

static PixelFormat BioLib.BioImage.GetPixelFormat ( int rgbChannelCount,
int bitsPerPixel )
static

If the bits per pixel is 8, then the pixel format is either 8bppIndexed, 24bppRgb, or 32bppArgb. If the bits per pixel is 16, then the pixel format is either 16bppGrayScale or 48bppRgb.

Parameters
rgbChannelCountThe number of channels in the image. For example, a grayscale image has 1 channel, a color image has 3 channels (red, green, blue).
bitsPerPixel8 or 16
Returns
The PixelFormat of the image.

Definition at line 8136 of file Bio.cs.

8137 {
8138 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
8139 {
8140 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
8141 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
8142 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
8143 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
8144 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
8145 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
8146 }
8147 else
8148 {
8149 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
8150 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
8151 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
8152 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
8153 }
8154 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
8155 }

◆ GetPixelFormat() [2/2]

static PixelFormat BioLib.BioImage.GetPixelFormat ( int rgbChannelCount,
ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px )
static

The function returns the appropriate PixelFormat based on the number of RGB channels and the pixel type.

Parameters
rgbChannelCountThe rgbChannelCount parameter represents the number of channels in the RGB color model. It can have a value of either 1 (for grayscale images) or 3 (for RGB color images).
pxThe parameter "px" is of type ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType. It represents the pixel type of the image, such as INT8, UINT8, INT16, or UINT16.
Returns
The method returns a PixelFormat value based on the input parameters.

Definition at line 8166 of file Bio.cs.

8167 {
8168 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
8169 {
8170 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
8171 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
8172 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
8173 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
8174 }
8175 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
8176 {
8177 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
8178 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
8179 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
8180 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
8181 }
8182 else
8183 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
8184 throw new InvalidDataException("RGBChannels Count of " + rgbChannelCount + " not supported.");
8185 }

◆ GetRegion()

BioImage BioLib.BioImage.GetRegion ( int x,
int y,
int w,
int h )

Definition at line 7995 of file Bio.cs.

7996 {
7997 string id = System.IO.Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(Filename);
7998 id.Replace(".ome", "");
7999 BioImage bm = Copy();
8000 bm.ID = id + ".ome.tif";
8001 bm.Filename = id + ".ome.tif";
8002 bm.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX + (PhysicalSizeX * PyramidalOrigin.X), StageSizeY + (PhysicalSizeY * PyramidalOrigin.Y), StageSizeZ),
8003 new Point3D(w * PhysicalSizeX, h * PhysicalSizeY, SizeZ * PhysicalSizeZ));
8004 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(w, h, bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
8005 bm.Resolutions.RemoveAt(0);
8006 Recorder.AddLine("BioLib.Images.GetImage(\"" + bm.ID + "\").GetRegion("+ x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");",false);
8007 return bm;
8008 }

7953 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
7954 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
7955 }
7956 }

7966 tilex = 0;
7967 if (tiley < 0)
7968 tiley = 0;

7970 tilex = SizeX;
7971 if (tiley >= SizeY)
7972 tiley = SizeY;

7974 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
7975 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
7976 int sy = tileSizeY;
7977 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
7978 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
7979 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
7980 if (sx <= 1)
7981 return null;
7982 if (sy <= 1)
7983 return null;
7984 try
7985 {
7986 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(index, tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
7987 return new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, new ZCT(), index, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
7988 }
7989 catch (Exception e)
7990 {
7991 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7992 return null;
7993 }
7994 }

◆ isOME()

static bool BioLib.BioImage.isOME ( string file)
static

If the file is a TIFF, check the ImageDescription tag for the string "OME-XML". If it's there, return true. If it's not a TIFF, return true. If it's a PNG, JPG, JPEG, or BMP, return false.

Parameters
filethe path to the image file
Returns
A boolean value.

Definition at line 6075 of file Bio.cs.

6076 {
6077 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
6078 {
6079 return true;
6080 }
6081 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
6082 {
6083 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
6084 string desc = "";
6085 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
6086 desc = f[0].ToString();
6087 image.Close();
6088 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
6089 return true;
6090 else
6091 return false;
6092 }
6093 if ((file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
6094 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
6095 {
6096 return false;
6097 }
6098 else return true;
6099 }

Definition at line 6040 of file Bio.cs.

6041 {
6042 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
6043 string desc = "";
6044 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
6045 image.Close();
6046 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
6047 int index = 0;
6048 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
6049 {
6050 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
6051 {
6052 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
6053 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
6054 int serie = int.Parse(val);
6055 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
6056 {
6057 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
6058 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
6059 if (info.Series > 1)
6060 return true;
6061 else
6062 return false;
6063 }
6064 }
6065 }
6066 return false;

4885 {
4886 // Ensure the range is valid
4887 if (ushortRange.Min < 0 || ushortRange.Max > ushort.MaxValue)
4888 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(nameof(ushortRange), "Range must be within 0 to ushort.MaxValue.");
4889
4890 // Map each value in the range
4891 int mappedMin = (int)((ushortRange.Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
4892 int mappedMax = (int)((ushortRange.Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
4893
4894 return new IntRange(mappedMin, mappedMax);

◆ MergeChannels() [1/2]

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.MergeChannels ( BioImage b2,
BioImage b )
static

This function takes two images and merges them together.

Parameters
BioImageThe image to be merged
BioImageThe image to be merged
Returns
A new BioImage object.

Definition at line 4379 of file Bio.cs.

4380 {
4381 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
4382 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
4383 res.series = b2.series;
4384 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
4385 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
4386 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
4387 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
4388 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
4389 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
4390 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
4391 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
4392 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
4393 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
4394 res.Resolutions.Add(b2.Resolutions[0]);
4395 res.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(res.StageSizeX, res.StageSizeY, res.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b2.SizeX,b2.SizeY,b2.SizeZ));
4396 int i = 0;
4397 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
4398 {
4399 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
4400 {
4401 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
4402 {
4403 if (i < b.ImageCount)
4404 {
4405 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
4406 int ind = b.GetFrameIndex(zi, 0, ti);
4407 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
4408 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[ind].Bytes, co, ind);
4409 res.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, ind);
4410 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
4411 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
4412 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
4413 if (anns.Count > 0)
4414 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
4415 }
4416 else
4417 {
4418 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
4419 int ind = b2.GetFrameIndex(zi, 0, ti);
4420 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
4421 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[ind].Bytes, co, ind);
4422 res.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, b.ImageCount + ind);
4423 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
4424 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
4425 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
4426 if (anns.Count > 0)
4427 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
4428 }
4429 i++;
4430 }
4431 }
4432 }
4433 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
4434 {
4435 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[ci].Copy());
4436 }
4437 for (int ci = 0; ci < b2.SizeC; ci++)
4438 {
4439 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
4440 }
4441 res.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
4442 if(res.Channels.Count > 1)
4443 res.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
4444 if (res.Channels.Count > 2)
4445 res.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
4446 Images.AddImage(res);
4447 res.imagesPerSeries = res.Buffers.Count;
4448 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
4449 do
4450 {
4451 Thread.Sleep(100);
4452 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
4453 AutoThreshold(res, false);
4454 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4455 res.StackThreshold(true);
4456 else
4457 res.StackThreshold(false);
4458 return res;
4459 }

4469 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);

◆ OpenFile() [4/4]

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.OpenFile ( string file,
int series,
bool tab,
bool addToImages,
bool tile,
int tileX,
int tileY,
int tileSizeX,
int tileSizeY )
static

The OpenFile function opens a BioImage file, reads its metadata, and loads the image data into a BioImage object.

Parameters
fileThe file path of the bioimage to be opened.
seriesThe series parameter is an integer that specifies the series number of the image to open.
tabThe "tab" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the BioImage should be opened in a new tab or not. If set to true, the BioImage will be opened in a new tab. If set to false, the BioImage will be opened in the current tab.
addToImagesA boolean value indicating whether the BioImage should be added to the Images collection.
tileThe "tile" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the image should be opened as a tiled image or not. If set to true, the image will be opened as a tiled image. If set to false, the image will be opened as a regular image.
tileXThe tileX parameter is an integer that represents the starting X coordinate of the tile. It is used when opening a tiled image to specify the position of the tile within the image.
tileYThe tileY parameter is used to specify the starting Y coordinate of the tile when opening a tiled image. It determines the position of the tile within the image.
tileSizeXThe tileSizeX parameter is the width of each tile in pixels. It is used when opening a tiled TIFF image to specify the size of the tiles.
tileSizeYThe tileSizeY parameter is the height of each tile in pixels when the image is tiled.
Returns
The method is returning a BioImage object.

5789 desc = f[0].ToString();
5790 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
5791 b.sizeC = 1;
5792 b.sizeT = 1;
5793 b.sizeZ = 1;
5794 bool imagej = false;
5795 if (f != null && !tile)
5796 {
5797 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
5798 desc = f[0].ToString();
5799 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
5800 {
5801 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5802 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5803 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
5804 else
5805 b.sizeC = 1;
5806 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
5807 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
5808 else
5809 b.sizeZ = 1;
5810 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
5811 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
5812 else

5814 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
5815 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
5816 else
5817 b.frameInterval = 1;
5818 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
5819 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
5820 else
5821 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
5822 imagej = true;
5823 }
5824 }
5825 int stride = 0;
5826 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5827 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
5828 {
5829 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5830 {
5831 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
5832 stride = SizeX * 2;
5833 }
5834 else
5835 {
5836 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
5837 stride = SizeX;
5838 }
5839 }
5840 else
5841 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
5842 {
5843 b.sizeC = 1;
5844 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5845 {
5846 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
5847 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
5848 }
5849 else
5850 {
5851 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
5852 stride = SizeX * 3;
5853 }
5854 }
5855 else
5856 {
5857 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
5858 stride = SizeX * 4;
5859 }
5860
5861 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5862 int index = 0;
5863 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5864 {
5865 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
5866 {
5867 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
5868 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5869 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5870 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5871 {
5872 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5873 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
5874 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
5875 ch.info = info;
5876 b.Channels.Add(ch);
5877 if (index == 0)
5878 {
5879 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
5880 }
5881 else
5882 if (index == 1)
5883 {
5884 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
5885 }
5886 else
5887 if (index == 2)
5888 {
5889 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
5890 }
5891 index++;
5892 }
5893 }
5894 else
5895 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
5896 {
5897 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
5898 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5899 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5900 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
5901 {
5902 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
5903 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
5904 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
5905 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
5906 }
5907 }
5908 else
5909 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5910 {
5911 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5912 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5913 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5914 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
5915 {
5916 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5917 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5918 }
5919 }
5920 }
5921 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
5922 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
5923 {
5924 tileSizeX = 1920;
5925 tileSizeY = 1080;
5926 }
5927
5928 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
5929 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
5930 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
5931
5932 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
5933 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
5934 {
5935 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
5936 {
5937 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
5938 }
5939 }
5940
5941 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
5942 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
5943 if (!imagej)
5944 b.sizeZ = pages;
5945 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
5946 bool inter = true;
5947 if (stride != str)
5948 inter = false;
5949 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
5950 if (tiled)
5951 {
5952 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
5953 if (vips)
5954 OpenVips(b);
5955 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
5956 {
5957 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
5958 {
5959 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
5960 {
5961 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, b.GetFrameIndex(z,c,t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5962 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
5963 bmp.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(bmp);
5964 }
5965 }
5966 }
5967 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
5968 }
5969 else
5970 {
5971 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
5972 {
5973 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
5974
5975 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
5976 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
5977 {
5978 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
5979 offset += stride;
5980 }
5981 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
5982 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
5983 inf.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(inf);
5984 }
5985 }
5986 image.Close();
5987 b.UpdateCoords();
5988 }
5989 else
5990 {
5991 Gdk.Pixbuf pf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(file);
5992 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
5993 PixelFormat px = GetPixelFormat(pf.NChannels, pf.BitsPerSample);
5994 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(pf.Width, pf.Height,px,96 * (1/2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000,0,0,0));
5995 b.bitsPerPixel = pf.BitsPerSample;
5996 b.Buffers.Add(new Bitmap(pf.Width, pf.Height, pf.Width * pf.NChannels, px, pf.Pixels));
5997 b.Buffers.Last().ID = Bitmap.CreateID(file, 0);
5998 b.Buffers.Last().Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers.Last());
5999 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, b.RGBChannelCount));
6000 b.Coords = new int[1, 1, 1];
6001 b.sizeC = 1;
6002 b.sizeT = 1;
6003 b.sizeZ = 1;
6004 }
6005 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
6006 {
6007 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
6008 b.StageSizeX = 0;
6009 b.StageSizeY = 0;
6010 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
6011 }
6012 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
6013
6014 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
6015 if (ome)
6016 {
6017 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
6018 }
6019 AutoThreshold(b, false);
6020 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6021 b.StackThreshold(true);
6022 else
6023 b.StackThreshold(false);
6024 if (addToImages)
6025 Images.AddImage(b);
6026 //pr.Close();
6027 //pr.Dispose();
6028 st.Stop();
6029 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
6030 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
6031 BioLib.Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
6032 return b;
6033 }

◆ OpenOME() [3/3]

static BioImage BioLib.BioImage.OpenOME ( string file,
int serie,
bool tab,
bool addToImages,
bool tile,
int tilex,
int tiley,
int tileSizeX,
int tileSizeY,
bool useOpenSlide = true )
static

The function "OpenOME" opens a bioimage file, with options to specify the series, whether to display it in a tab, whether to add it to existing images, whether to tile the image, and the tile size.

Parameters
fileThe file parameter is a string that represents the file path or name of the OME (Open Microscopy Environment) file that you want to open.
serieThe "serie" parameter is an integer that represents the series number of the image to be opened.
tabThe "tab" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the image should be opened in a new tab or not. If set to true, the image will be opened in a new tab. If set to false, the image will be opened in the current tab.
addToImagesThe "addToImages" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether the opened image should be added to a collection of images. If set to true, the image will be added to the collection. If set to false, the image will not be added.
tileThe "tile" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether or not to tile the images. If set to true, the images will be tiled according to the specified tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, and tileSizeY parameters. If set to false, the images will not be tiled.
tilexThe parameter "tilex" is an integer that represents the starting x-coordinate of the tile.
tileyThe parameter "tiley" is used to specify the number of tiles in the y-direction when tiling the image.
tileSizeXThe tileSizeX parameter specifies the width of each tile in pixels when tiling the images.
tileSizeYThe tileSizeY parameter is the height of each tile in pixels when tiling the images.

The function "OpenOME" opens a bioimage file, with options to specify the series, whether to

Definition at line 7148 of file Bio.cs.

7149 {
7150 if (file == null || file == "")
7151 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
7152 //We wait incase OME has not initialized.
7153 do
7154 {
7155 Thread.Sleep(10);
7156 } while (!initialized);
7157 Console.WriteLine("OpenOME " + file);
7158 reader = new ImageReader();
7159 if (tileSizeX == 0)
7160 tileSizeX = 1920;
7161 if (tileSizeY == 0)
7162 tileSizeY = 1080;
7163 progFile = file;
7164 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
7165 b.Type = ImageType.stack;
7166 b.Loading = true;
7167 if (b.meta == null)
7168 b.meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
7169 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7170 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
7171 if (cf != null)
7172 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
7173 if (cf != f)
7174 {
7175 reader.close();
7176 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
7177 try
7178 {
7179 Status = "Opening file " + b.Filename;
7180 reader.setId(f);
7181 }
7182 catch (Exception e)
7183 {
7184 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7185 return null;
7186 }
7187 }
7188
7189 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
7190 reader.setSeries(serie);
7191 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
7192 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
7193 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
7194 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
7195 try
7196 {
7197 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
7198 }
7199 catch (Exception)
7200 {
7201 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
7202 }
7203
7204 b.id = file;
7205 b.file = file;
7206 int SizeX, SizeY;
7207 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
7208 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
7209 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
7210 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
7211 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
7212 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
7213 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
7214 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
7215 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
7216 b.imRead = reader;
7217 List<Resolution> ress = new List<Resolution>();
7218 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
7219 b.bitsPerPixel = 8;
7220 else
7221 b.bitsPerPixel = 16;
7222 b.series = serie;
7223 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
7224 if (vips)
7225 OpenVips(b);
7226 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
7227 int i = 0;
7228 int sumSamples = 0;
7229 while (true)
7230 {
7231 Status = "Reading channels.";
7232 bool def = false;
7233 try
7234 {
7235 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
7236 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, s);
7237 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
7238 {
7239 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
7240 sumSamples += s;
7241 def = true;
7242 b.Channels.Add(ch);
7243 }
7244 if (i == 0)
7245 {
7246 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
7247 }
7248 else
7249 if (i == 1)
7250 {
7251 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
7252 }
7253 else
7254 if (i == 2)
7255 {
7256 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
7257 }
7258 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
7259 if (!def)
7260 break;
7261 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
7262 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
7263 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
7264 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
7265 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
7266 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
7267 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
7268 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
7269 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
7270 {
7271 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
7272 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
7273 }
7274 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
7275 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
7276 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
7277 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
7278 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
7279 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
7280 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
7281 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
7282 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
7283 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
7284 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
7285 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
7286 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
7287 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
7288
7289
7290 }
7291 catch (Exception e)
7292 {
7293 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7294 if (!def)
7295 break;
7296 }
7297 i++;
7298 }
7299 try
7300 {
7301 if(b.meta.getObjectiveNominalMagnification(serie, 0) != null)
7302 {
7303 b.Magnification = b.meta.getObjectiveNominalMagnification(serie, 0).intValue();
7304 }
7305 }
7306 catch (Exception e)
7307 {
7308 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7309 }
7310
7311 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
7312 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
7313 {
7314 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
7315 }
7316 try
7317 {
7318 Status = "Reading wells.";
7319 int wells = b.meta.getWellCount(0);
7320 if (wells > 0)
7321 {
7322 b.Type = ImageType.well;
7323 b.Plate = new WellPlate(b);
7324 tile = false;
7325 }
7326 }
7327 catch (Exception e)
7328 {
7329 //This file is not a well plate.
7330 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7331 }
7332 if (reader.getResolutionCount() > 0)
7333 ress.AddRange(GetResolutions(b));
7334 Console.WriteLine("Done reading resolutions.");
7335 reader.setSeries(serie);
7336
7337 int pyramidCount = 0;
7338 int pyramidResolutions = 0;
7339 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
7340 Console.WriteLine("Determining pyramidal levels.");
7341 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
7342 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
7343 if (ress.Count > 1 && b.Type != ImageType.well)
7344 {
7345 if (ress[0].SizeX > ress[1].SizeX)
7346 {
7347 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
7348 tile = true;
7349 //We need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
7350 int? sr = null;
7351 for (int r = 0; r < ress.Count - 1; r++)
7352 {
7353 if (ress[r].SizeX > ress[r + 1].SizeX && ress[r].PixelFormat == ress[r + 1].PixelFormat)
7354 {
7355 if (sr == null)
7356 {
7357 sr = r;
7358 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
7359 }
7360 }
7361 else
7362 {
7363 if (ress[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == ress[r].PixelFormat)
7364 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
7365 sr = null;
7366 }
7367 }
7368 pyramidCount = prs.Count;
7369 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
7370 {
7371 pyramidResolutions += (prs[p].Item2 - prs[p].Item1) + 1;
7372 }
7373 if (prs[serie].Item2 == 0)
7374 {
7375 prs[serie] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[serie].Item1, b.seriesCount-1);
7376 }
7377 }
7378 }
7379 if (b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
7380 {
7381 Console.WriteLine("Determining Label and Macro resolutions.");
7382 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
7383 {
7384 for (int r = prs[p].Item1; r < prs[p].Item2 + 1; r++)
7385 {
7386 b.Resolutions.Add(ress[r]);
7387 }
7388 }
7389 //If we have 2 resolutions that we're not added they are the label & macro resolutions so we add them to the image.
7390 if (ress.Count > b.Resolutions.Count)
7391 {
7392 b.LabelResolution = ress.Count - 1;
7393 b.Resolutions.Add(ress[ress.Count - 1]);
7394 b.MacroResolution = ress.Count - 2;
7395 b.Resolutions.Add(ress[ress.Count - 2]);
7396 }
7397 }
7398 if (b.Resolutions.Count == 0)
7399 b.Resolutions.AddRange(ress);
7400
7401 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
7402 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
7403 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
7404 {
7405 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
7406 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
7407 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7408 int scount = 1;
7409 try
7410 {
7411 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
7412 }
7413 catch (Exception e)
7414 {
7415 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
7416 }
7417 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
7418 {
7419 Status = "Reading ROI " + (sc+1).ToString() + "/" + scount;
7420 string typ = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
7421 ROI an = new ROI();
7422 an.roiID = roiID;
7423 an.roiName = roiName;
7424 an.shapeIndex = sc;
7425 if (typ == "Point")
7426 {
7427 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
7428 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
7429 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7430 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7431 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
7432 an.coord = new ZCT();
7433 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
7434 if (nz != null)
7435 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7436 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
7437 if (nc != null)
7438 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7439 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
7440 if (nt != null)
7441 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7442 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
7443 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
7444 if (fl != null)
7445 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7446 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
7447 if (ff != null)
7448 an.family = ff.name();
7449 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7450 if (col != null)
7451 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7452 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7453 if (fw != null)
7454 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7455 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7456 if (colf != null)
7457 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7458 }
7459 else
7460 if (typ == "Line")
7461 {
7462 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
7463 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
7464 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7465 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7466 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7467 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7468 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
7469 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
7470 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
7471 if (nz != null)
7472 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7473 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
7474 if (nc != null)
7475 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7476 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
7477 if (nt != null)
7478 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7479 an.coord = co;
7480 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
7481 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
7482 if (fl != null)
7483 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7484 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLineFontFamily(im, sc);
7485 if (ff != null)
7486 an.family = ff.name();
7487 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7488 if (col != null)
7489 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7490 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7491 if (fw != null)
7492 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7493 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
7494 if (colf != null)
7495 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7496 }
7497 else
7498 if (typ == "Rectangle")
7499 {
7500 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
7501 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
7502 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7503 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7504 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
7505 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
7506 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
7507 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
7508 if (nz != null)
7509 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7510 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
7511 if (nc != null)
7512 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7513 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
7514 if (nt != null)
7515 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7516 an.coord = co;
7517
7518 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
7519 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
7520 if (fl != null)
7521 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7522 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getRectangleFontFamily(im, sc);
7523 if (ff != null)
7524 an.family = ff.name();
7525 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
7526 if (col != null)
7527 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7528 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7529 if (fw != null)
7530 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7531 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
7532 if (colf != null)
7533 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7534 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
7535
7536 }
7537 else
7538 if (typ == "Ellipse")
7539 {
7540 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
7541 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
7542 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7543 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7544 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7545 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7546 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
7547 double w = ew * 2;
7548 double h = eh * 2;
7549 double x = px - ew;
7550 double y = py - eh;
7551 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
7552 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
7553 if (nz != null)
7554 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7555 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
7556 if (nc != null)
7557 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7558 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
7559 if (nt != null)
7560 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7561 an.coord = co;
7562 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
7563 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
7564 if (fl != null)
7565 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7566 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getEllipseFontFamily(im, sc);
7567 if (ff != null)
7568 an.family = ff.name();
7569 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
7570 if (col != null)
7571 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7572 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7573 if (fw != null)
7574 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7575 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
7576 if (colf != null)
7577 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7578 }
7579 else
7580 if (typ == "Polygon")
7581 {
7582 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
7583 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
7584 an.closed = true;
7585 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
7586 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7587 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
7588 if (pts.Length > 100)
7589 {
7590 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
7591 }
7592 an.AddPoints(pts);
7593 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
7594 if (nz != null)
7595 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7596 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
7597 if (nc != null)
7598 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7599 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
7600 if (nt != null)
7601 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7602 an.coord = co;
7603 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
7604 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
7605 if (fl != null)
7606 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7607 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolygonFontFamily(im, sc);
7608 if (ff != null)
7609 an.family = ff.name();
7610 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
7611 if (col != null)
7612 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7613 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7614 if (fw != null)
7615 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7616 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
7617 if (colf != null)
7618 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7619 }
7620 else
7621 if (typ == "Polyline")
7622 {
7623 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
7624 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
7625 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
7626 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7627 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
7628 {
7629 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
7630 }
7631 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
7632 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
7633 if (nz != null)
7634 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7635 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
7636 if (nc != null)
7637 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7638 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
7639 if (nt != null)
7640 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7641 an.coord = co;
7642 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
7643 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
7644 if (fl != null)
7645 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7646 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolylineFontFamily(im, sc);
7647 if (ff != null)
7648 an.family = ff.name();
7649 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7650 if (col != null)
7651 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7652 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7653 if (fw != null)
7654 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7655 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
7656 if (colf != null)
7657 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7658 }
7659 else
7660 if (typ == "Label")
7661 {
7662 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
7663 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
7664
7665 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
7666 if (nz != null)
7667 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7668 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
7669 if (nc != null)
7670 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7671 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
7672 if (nt != null)
7673 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7674 an.coord = co;
7675
7676 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
7677 if (fl != null)
7678 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7679 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLabelFontFamily(im, sc);
7680 if (ff != null)
7681 an.family = ff.name();
7682 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
7683 if (col != null)
7684 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7685 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7686 if (fw != null)
7687 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7688 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
7689 if (colf != null)
7690 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7691 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
7692 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
7693 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
7694 }
7695 else
7696 if (typ == "Mask")
7697 {
7698 byte[] bts = b.meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
7699 bool end = b.meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
7700 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, b.Resolutions[0].SizeX, b.Resolutions[0].SizeY,new PointD(b.StageSizeX,b.StageSizeY),b.PhysicalSizeX,b.PhysicalSizeY);
7701 an.Text = b.meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
7702 an.id = b.meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
7703 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
7704 if (nz != null)
7705 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7706 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
7707 if (nc != null)
7708 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7709 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
7710 if (nt != null)
7711 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7712 an.coord = co;
7713
7714 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
7715 if (fl != null)
7716 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7717 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
7718 if (ff != null)
7719 an.family = ff.name();
7720 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
7721 if (col != null)
7722 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7723 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7724 if (fw != null)
7725 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7726 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
7727 if (colf != null)
7728 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7729 }
7730 b.Annotations.Add(an);
7731 }
7732 }
7733
7734 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
7735 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
7736
7737 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
7738 if (b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
7739 {
7740
7741 try
7742 {
7743
7744 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
7745 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
7746 {
7747 Status = "Opening file with OpenSlide.";
7748 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
7749 b.openslideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file, true);
7750 }
7751 else
7752 {
7753 Status = "Opening file with BioFormats.";
7754 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
7755 }
7756 }
7757 catch (Exception e)
7758 {
7759 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
7760 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
7761 }
7762 tile = true;
7763 }
7764 // read the image data bytes
7765 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
7766 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
7767 int z = 0;
7768 int c = 0;
7769 int t = 0;
7770 if (!tile)
7771 {
7772 Status = "Reading image planes.";
7773 try
7774 {
7775 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
7776 {
7777 Progress = ((float)p / (float)pages) * 100;
7778 Bitmap bf;
7779 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
7780 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
7781 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
7782 }
7783 }
7784 catch (Exception ex)
7785 {
7786 Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);
7787 }
7788
7789 }
7790 else
7791 {
7792 Status = "Reading tiles.";
7793 b.imRead = reader;
7794 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
7795 {
7796 Progress = ((float)p / (float)pages) * 100;
7797 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
7798 }
7799 }
7800 int pls;
7801 try
7802 {
7803 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
7804 }
7805 catch (Exception)
7806 {
7807 pls = 0;
7808 }
7809 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
7810 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
7811 {
7812 Plane pl = new Plane();
7813 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
7814 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
7815 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
7816 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7817 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
7818 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7819 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
7820 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7821 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
7822 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
7823 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
7824 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
7825 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi) != null)
7826 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
7827 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi) != null)
7828 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
7829 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
7830 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
7831 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7832 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
7833 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
7834 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
7835 }
7836 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
7837 if (RGBChannelCount >= 3)
7838 {
7839 b.sizeC = sumSamples / b.Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel;
7840 }
7841 string ord = reader.getDimensionOrder();
7842 if(ord == "XYZCT")
7843 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.ZCT);
7844 else if(ord == "XYCZT")
7845 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.CZT);
7846 else if (ord == "XYTCZ")
7847 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.TCZ);
7848 AutoThreshold(b, true);
7849 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
7850 b.StackThreshold(true);
7851 else
7852 b.StackThreshold(false);
7853 try
7854 {
7855 if(!b.isPyramidal)
7856 reader.close();
7857 if (addToImages)
7858 Images.AddImage(b);
7859 }
7860 catch (Exception e)
7861 {
7862 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7863 }
7864 b.Loading = false;
7865 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),false, file, serie, tab, addToImages, tile, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
7866 return b;
7867 }
BioLib.BioImage.ToString
override string ToString()
This function returns the filename of the object, and the location of the object in the 3D space.
Definition Bio.cs:9428

◆ OpenOMEROIs()

static List< ROI > BioLib.BioImage.OpenOMEROIs ( string file,
int series )
static

It reads the OME-XML file and converts the ROIs to a list of ROI objects.

Parameters
filethe path to the OME-TIFF file
seriesthe series number of the image you want to open
Returns
A list of ROI objects.

8654 int rc = meta.getROICount();

8791 double w = ew * 2;
8792 double h = eh * 2;
8793 double x = px - ew;
8794 double y = py - eh;

8916 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8917 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
8918 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
8919 if (col != null)
8920 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8921 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8922 if (fw != null)
8923 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8924 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
8925 if (colf != null)
8926 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8927 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
8928 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
8929 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
8930 }
8931 else
8932 if (type == "Mask")
8933 {
8934 byte[] bts = meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
8935 bool end = meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
8936 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, SizeX, SizeY, new PointD(stageSizeX, stageSizeY),physicalSizeX,physicalSizeY);
8937 an.Text = meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
8938 an.id = meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
8939 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
8940 if (nz != null)
8941 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
8942 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
8943 if (nc != null)
8944 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
8945 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
8946 if (nt != null)
8947 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
8948 an.coord = co;
8949
8950 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
8951 if (fl != null)
8952 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
8953 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
8954 if (ff != null)
8955 an.family = ff.name();
8956 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
8957 if (col != null)
8958 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
8959 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
8960 if (fw != null)
8961 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
8962 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
8963 if (colf != null)
8964 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
8965 }
8966 }
8967 }
8968
8969 imageReader.close();
8970 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file, series);
8971 return Annotations;
8972 }

5575 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();

5579 {
5580 string desc = f[0].ToString();

5582 {
5583 imDesc.SetString(desc);
5584 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
5585 count = imDesc.channels;
5586 }
5587 }

static

The SaveAsync function saves data to a file asynchronously.

Parameters
fileThe file parameter is a string that represents the file path or name where the data will be saved.
idThe "id" parameter is a string that represents an identifier for the save operation. It could be used to uniquely identify the saved data or to specify a specific location or format for the saved file.
serieThe "serie" parameter is an integer that represents a series or sequence number. It is used as a parameter in the SaveAsync method.
omeThe "ome" parameter is a boolean value that determines whether or not to perform a specific action in the saving process.

◆ SaveOMEPyramidal()

static void BioLib.BioImage.SaveOMEPyramidal ( BioImage[] bms,
string file,
Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression,
