static

The function SaveOMEPyramidal saves a collection of BioImages as a pyramidal OME-TIFF file.

Parameters
bmsAn array of BioImage objects representing the images to be saved.
fileThe file parameter is a string that represents the file path where the OME Pyramidal TIFF file will be saved.
compressionThe compression parameter is of type Enums.ForeignTiffCompression and it specifies the compression method to be used when saving the TIFF file.

Definition at line 6546 of file Bio.cs.

6547 {
6548 if (File.Exists(file))
6549 File.Delete(file);
6550 Status = "Saving OME Pyramidal";
6551 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
6552 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
6553 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
6554 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
6555 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
6556 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
6557 {
6558 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Level];
6559 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
6560 {
6561 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
6562 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6563 {
6564 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6565 }
6566 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6567 {
6568 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6569 }
6570 }
6571 else
6572 {
6573 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
6574 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
6575 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
6576 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6577 {
6578 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6579 }
6580 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
6581 {
6582 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
6583 }
6584 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
6585 }
6586 }
6587 int s = 0;
6588 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
6589 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
6590 int minx = int.MaxValue;
6591 int miny = int.MaxValue;
6592 double last = 0;
6593 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6594 {
6595 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
6596 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
6597 if (minx > xs)
6598 minx = xs;
6599 if (miny > ys)
6600 miny = ys;
6601 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
6602 last = px;
6603 }
6604 s = 0;
6605 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
6606 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
6607 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
6608 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
6609 NetVips.Image img = null;
6610 int ib = 0;
6611
6612 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6613 {
6614 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
6615 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
6616 c = 3;
6617 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
6618 met +=
6619 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
6620 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
6621 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
6622 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
6623 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
6624 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
6625 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
6626 int i = 0;
6627 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
6628 {
6629 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
6630 i++;
6631 }
6632 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
6633 ib++;
6634 }
6635 met += "</OME>";
6636 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
6637 {
6638 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
6639 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
6640 int bands = GetBands(pf);
6641 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
6642 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
6643 else
6644 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
6645 int i = 0;
6646 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
6647 {
6648 Progress = ((float)i / (float)bis[px].Count) * 100;
6649 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
6650 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
6651 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
6652 NetVips.Image tile;
6653 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6654 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
6655 else
6656 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
6657 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
6658 i++;
6659 };
6660 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
6661 {
6662 // Set the ImageDescription tag
6663 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
6664 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
6665 });
6666 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
6667 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
6668 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
6669 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
6670 else
6671 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
6672 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
6673 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
6674 s++;
6675 }
6676
6677 }

static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
The function "GetBands" returns the number of color bands for a given pixel format in the AForge libr...
Definition Bio.cs:6519

◆ SaveOMESeries()

static void BioLib.BioImage.SaveOMESeries ( BioImage[] files,
string f,
bool planes )
static

This function takes a list of image files and saves them as a single OME-TIFF file.

Parameters
filesan array of file paths to the images to be saved
fthe file name to save to
planesif true, the planes will be saved as well.

6443 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
6444 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
6445 {
6446 //Correct order of parameters.
6447 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
6448 {

6450 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);

6452 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
6453 {
6454 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
6455 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
6456 }
6457 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6458 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6459 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
6460 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
6461 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
6462 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
6463 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
6464 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
6465 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
6466
6467 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
6468 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
6469 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
6470 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
6471 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
6472
6473 }
6474
6475 }
6476 writer = new ImageWriter();
6477 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
6478 try
6479 {
6480 Status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
6481 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
6482 {
6483 Console.WriteLine("Writer setId: " + files[i]);
6484 writer.setId(f);
6485 BioImage b = files[i];
6486 progFile = files[i].Filename;
6487 writer.setSeries(i);
6488 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
6489 {
6490 byte[] bts = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
6491 writer.saveBytes(bu, bts);
6492 Progress = ((float)bu / (float)b.Buffers.Count) * 100;
6493 }
6494 }
6495 if (!OperatingSystem.IsMacOS())
6496 {
6497 Console.WriteLine("Closing writer.");
6498 writer.close();
6499 }
6500 }
6501 catch (Exception e)
6502 {
6503 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6504 }
6505
6506 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, files, f, planes);
6507 }

◆ SavePyramidalAsync()

static async Task BioLib.BioImage.SavePyramidalAsync ( BioImage[] imgs,
string file,
Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com,
int compLevel )
static

The function SavePyramidalAsync saves an array of BioImage objects as a pyramidal TIFF file asynchronously.

Parameters
imgsimgs is an array of BioImage objects.
fileThe "file" parameter is a string that represents the file path where the pyramidal image will be saved.
comThe parameter "com" is of type Enums.ForeignTiffCompression, which is an enumeration representing different compression options for the TIFF file.
compLevelThe compLevel parameter is an integer that represents the compression level for the TIFF file. It is used to specify the level of compression to be applied to the image data when saving the pyramidal image. The higher the compression level, the smaller the file size but potentially lower image quality.

Definition at line 8518 of file Bio.cs.

8519 {
8520 bms = imgs;
8521 savefile = file;
8522 comp = com;
8523 compLev = compLevel;
8524 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
8525 }

5532 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);

5534 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
5535 {
5536 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
5537 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
5538 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
5539 }
5540 else
5541 {
5542 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
5543 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
5544 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
5545 }
5546 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
5547 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
5548 // specify the page number
5549 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
5550 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
5551 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
5552 {
5553 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
5554 offset += stride;
5555 }
5556 image.WriteDirectory();
5557 im++;
5558 }
5559 }
5560 }
5561 }
5562 image.Dispose();
5563 }

9019 {
9020 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
9021 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
9022 return null;
9023 ROI an = new ROI();
9024 string val = "";
9025 bool inSep = false;
9026 int col = 0;
9027 double x = 0;
9028 double y = 0;
9029 double w = 0;
9030 double h = 0;
9031 string line = sts;
9032 bool points = false;
9033 char sep = '"';
9034 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
9035 {
9036 char c = line[i];
9037 if (c == sep)
9038 {
9039 if (!inSep)
9040 {
9041 inSep = true;
9042 }
9043 else
9044 inSep = false;
9045 continue;
9046 }
9047
9048 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
9049 {
9050 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
9051 if (col == 0)
9052 {
9053 //ROIID
9054 an.roiID = val;
9055 }
9056 else
9057 if (col == 1)
9058 {
9059 //ROINAME
9060 an.roiName = val;
9061 }
9062 else
9063 if (col == 2)
9064 {
9065 //TYPE
9066 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
9067 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
9068 an.closed = true;
9069 }
9070 else
9071 if (col == 3)
9072 {
9073 //ID
9074 an.id = val;
9075 }
9076 else
9077 if (col == 4)
9078 {
9079 //SHAPEINDEX/
9080 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
9081 }
9082 else
9083 if (col == 5)
9084 {
9085 //TEXT/
9086 an.Text = val;
9087 }
9088 else
9089 if (col == 6)
9090 {
9091 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
9092 }
9093 else
9094 if (col == 7)
9095 {
9096 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
9097 }
9098 else
9099 if (col == 8)
9100 {
9101 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
9102 }
9103 else
9104 if (col == 9)
9105 {
9106 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
9107 }
9108 else
9109 if (col == 10)
9110 {
9111 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9112 }
9113 else
9114 if (col == 11)
9115 {
9116 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9117 }
9118 else
9119 if (col == 12)
9120 {
9121 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9122 }
9123 else
9124 if (col == 13)
9125 {
9126 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9127 }
9128 else
9129 if (col == 14)
9130 {
9131 //POINTS
9132 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
9133 points = false;
9134 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
9135 }
9136 else
9137 if (col == 15)
9138 {
9139 //STROKECOLOR
9140 string[] st = val.Split(',');
9141 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
9142 }
9143 else
9144 if (col == 16)
9145 {
9146 //STROKECOLORW
9147 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9148 }
9149 else
9150 if (col == 17)
9151 {
9152 //FILLCOLOR
9153 string[] st = val.Split(',');
9154 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
9155 }
9156 else
9157 if (col == 18)
9158 {
9159 //FONTSIZE
9160 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
9161 an.fontSize = (float)s;
9162 an.family = "Times New Roman";
9163 }
9164 col++;
9165 val = "";
9166 }
9167 else
9168 val += c;
9169 }
9170
9171 return an;
9172 }

4341 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
4342 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
4343 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
4344 b.sizeT = te - ts;
4345 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
4346 {
4347 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
4348 {
4349 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
4350 {
4351 int ind = orig.GetFrameIndex(zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti);
4352 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
4353 bf.Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(bf);
4354 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
4355 b.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, i);
4356 i++;
4357 }
4358 }
4359 }
4360 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
4361 {
4362 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
4363 }
4364 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
4365 AutoThreshold(b, false);
4366 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4367 b.StackThreshold(true);
4368 else
4369 b.StackThreshold(false);
4370 Images.AddImage(b);
4371 return b;
4372 }

◆ ToImageSpace() [2/5]

static PointD[] BioLib.BioImage.ToImageSpace ( List< PointD > p,
double stageSizeX,
double stageSizeY,
double physicalSizeX,
double physicalSizeY )
static

The function takes a list of points in stage space and converts them to image space using the provided stage and physical size parameters.

Parameters
pA list of PointD objects representing points in stage space.
stageSizeXThe width of the stage or canvas in pixels.
stageSizeYThe stageSizeY parameter represents the size of the stage or canvas in the Y-axis direction. It is used to calculate the Y-coordinate of each point in the p list in image space.
physicalSizeXThe physical size of the X-axis in the image space.
physicalSizeYThe physical size of the Y-axis in the coordinate system of the stage or image.
Returns
The method is returning an array of PointD objects.

Definition at line 8115 of file Bio.cs.

8116 {
8117 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
8118 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
8119 {
8120 PointD pp = new PointD();
8121 pp.X = ((p[i].X - stageSizeX) / physicalSizeX);
8122 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - stageSizeY) / physicalSizeY);
8123 ps[i] = pp;
8124 }
8125 return ps;
8126 }

4195 {

◆ ToStageSpace() [5/7]

static PointD[] BioLib.BioImage.ToStageSpace ( PointD[] p,

double volumeX,
double volumeY )
static

It takes a list of points, and converts them from a coordinate system where the origin is in the center of the image, to a coordinate system where the origin is in the top left corner of the image.

Parameters
pthe array of points to convert
physicalSizeXThe width of the image in microns
physicalSizeYThe height of the image in microns
volumeXThe X position of the volume in stage space.
volumeYThe Y position of the top left corner of the volume in stage space.
Returns
A PointD array.

Definition at line 4300 of file Bio.cs.

4304 {
4305 PointD pp = new PointD();
4306 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
4307 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
4308 ps[i] = pp;
4309 }

◆ VipsSupport()

static bool BioLib.BioImage.VipsSupport ( string file)
static

The function checks if a given file is supported by the Vips library and returns true if it is, false otherwise.

Parameters
fileThe "file" parameter is a string that represents the file path of the TIFF image that you want to load using the NetVips library.
Returns
The method is returning a boolean value. If the try block is executed successfully, it will return true. If an exception is caught, it will return false.

Definition at line 8547 of file Bio.cs.

8548 {
8549 try
8550 {
8551 netim = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
8552 Settings.AddSettings("VipsSupport", "true");
8553 }
8554 catch (Exception e)
8555 {
8556 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
8557 return false;
8558 }
8559 netim.Close();
8560 netim.Dispose();
8561 return true;
8562 }

◆ Level

int BioLib.BioImage.Level
getset

Definition at line 2715 of file Bio.cs.

2716 {
2717 get
2718 {
2719 int l = 0;
2720 if (openslideBase != null)
2721 l = OpenSlideGTK.TileUtil.GetLevel(openslideBase.Schema.Resolutions, Resolution);
2722 else
2723 if (slideBase != null)
2724 l = LevelFromResolution(Resolution);
2725 if (l < 0)
2726 return 0;
2727 return l;
2728 }
2729 set
2730 {
2731 if(Type == ImageType.well)
2732 {
2733 level = value;
2734 reader.setId(file);
2735 reader.setSeries(value);
2736 // read the image data bytes
2737 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
2738 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
2739 PixelFormat pf = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2740 int w = Buffers[0].SizeX; int h = Buffers[0].SizeY;
2741 Buffers.Clear();
2742 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
2743 {
2744 Bitmap bf;
2745 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
2746 bf = new Bitmap(file, w, h, pf, bytes, new ZCT(), p, null, littleEndian, inter);
2747 Buffers.Add(bf);
2748 }
2749 }
2750 }
2751 }
